title: Plantera
description: A plant marketplace community platform where plant enthusiasts come together to shop and sell plants, and inspire others with plant care guides.
highlights: Engineered RESTful API endpoints with Express.js to streamline client-server communication
Built a persistent shopping cart feature with Redux and Web Storage API, maintaining data across sessions
Designed search and filter functionality to help users easily browse and find plants
Incorporated Quill rich-text editor to allow users to create and publish plant-related articles
Established custom user authentication with bcrypt and React routes, effectively managing user access
Configured Stripe for easy, secure payment processing

title: The Paw
description: A pet-friendly business review platform for businesses to showcase their services, and pet owners to share their experiences.
highlights: Led frontend development, setting up an efficient Git workflow for optimized collaboration and version control
Developed the backend with Python and Flask, handling server-side logic and data processing
Designed a mobile-first, responsive UI with React for viewing business details, adding reviews, and uploading photos
Integrated Amazon Web Services (AWS) S3 for efficient photo management and storage
